content: i used k2tog k1 ssk in the middle of the right side row instead of a double central decrease to get a bold diagonal line through the middle of the domino block i cast on 51 stitches but you can cast on any large odd number of stitches to begin there are 2 pattern row any combination of yarn and needles will work this simple block knits up fast the block pictured is 5 5 square skills needed cast on knit k2tog ssk purl p2tog and k3tog gauge is **not** important in this pattern any block-able yarn/thread will work make a swatch to check gauge and appearance 36 yards of lion brand 24/7 yarn will make a 51-stitch big diagonal domino block at gauge
